definition: original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: Have a special inventive mind the design and the specialized service quality form a splendorous contrast.
sentences.chinese: 獨具匠心的設計與專業的服務品質相映成輝。

sentences.english: Professor Li Liangyu always makes great efforts and shows unusual ingenuity in his supervision of Ph. D. candidates in writing dissertations.
sentences.chinese: 李良玉教授指導博士論文，傾盡全力，獨具匠心。

sentences.english: Railway father Zhan Tianyou showed ingenuity in building railways .
sentences.chinese: 鐵路之父詹天佑獨具匠心築路與創造。

definition: original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
to resemble nature itself/of the highest quality (idiom)
lit. to fly one's banner on a solitary tree (idiom); fig. to act as a loner/to stand out/to develop one's own school/to have attitude of one's own
to have a unique style of one's own (idiom)
to blend into one another/to blend together well
to be intensely proud of sth (idiom)
living spirit, living image (idiom); true to life/vivid and realistic
